topic.title: IRC Server on ZeroNet
topic.body: Is it possible to host an IRC Server VIA ZeroNet? If so, could someone give me a guide or some instructions?

topic.title: Deleting ZeroMail Messages.
topic.body: How does one delete ZeroMail messages? Everytime I try, it will hide the message until I clear my history, cookies, etc... then it will show up again! Any ideas?

topic.title: Deleting ZeroMail's
topic.body: How do I delete messages on ZeroMail? Every time I do, once I clear my history, cache, etc... it comes right back! Any ideas?

topic.title: Home Made Guns
topic.body: Anyone know some decent sites containing detailed instructions for creating firearms such as zipguns, etc? Seems cool and interesting.

topic.title: Looking for Information:
topic.body:
I am looking for useful information for the Hon David Parker (New Zealand Government).

Due to the events in Christchurch, New Zealand, I am researching important things such as people in government, etc to be able to link potential things together. Sorry I couldn't be more descriptive, but I can't.

I've looked at the files, they appear to be legit and Twitter + Pastebin are removing some of their shit so they moved to steemit.com. Time will tell!
